reviewText: NBC result were way delayed when the Olympics happened.  It will be another 7 weeks after release date before you get the DVD/B-Ray results.  HAHA!!!  Nothing like NBC being greedy with the rights...  Not even John Stewart or Colbert was even allowed to show footage from the Olympics for their news coverage...  Although Colbert did his own interpretations with dolls that admittedly was even better than what was worth waiting for from NBC.
summary: Will it be worth the wait time???
Title: N/A

reviewText: This was the worst dvd that I got on the Olympics. This was even shorter than highlights. I don't know what to call it, but it was terrible. I would not recommend this to anyone. I was highly disappointed.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I will never buy an NBC Olympic DVD again. It was a complete rip off. I thought it would be the same as the 2008 Olympic DVD. I was expecting the complete opening and closing ceremony's, but got bits and pieces instead. Shame on NBC for such a blatant misrepresentation in advertising this DVD.
Title: N/A

reviewText: It had all the races that I wanted to be able to review.  Good coverage of swimming events!  What a wonderful investment to pull swimmers into the pool throughout a cold winter.  Timely shipping.
Title: N/A

reviewText: It's crap.  Don't buy this bullcrap!  Save your money.  CTV's coverage was WAY better than NBC.  This just sucks.  The coverage that they put in this DVD makes no sense.  The commentators are annoying and the camera angles SUCK.  It doesn't even include Usain Bolt winning!  Can you believe this!
Title: N/A

reviewText: i'd like to have the opening for 2012 London Olympic games, beside that, it's nice to have this DVD, it's useful.
Title: N/A
